title: Vivanta Guwahati – IHCL’s first foray in North East India introduced in-house bottling plant
description: Jayanta Das, Area Director, and General Manager of Vivanta Guwahati, expressed the hotel's dedication to zero single-use plastics in alignment with IHCL's ESG+ framework of Paathya. He remarked, "Vivanta Guwahati has once again established a benchmark in transitioning to a more sustainable Assam."
